## Summer/Fall 2023

[Male Maturity
Seminar](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZrreLOPP7l0MbpZ15ENOE7fwcafGiP72?usp=drive_link).
Presentations by: Nancy J Peterson, Kevin J. Kolmos, David M. Wyanski, Mark Wuenschel, and Emilee Tholke on male reproductive terminology and staging with warm water and cold water species examples. 



## Winter 2023

[Female Maturity
Seminar](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c-8odvb35c9q5k-MYXl-KnOpF0GMg3O9/view?usp=share_link).
We had five presentations:

1.  Susan Lowerre-Barbieri: Determining female maturity: Indicators and
    analytical approaches.

2.  Nancy Brown-Peterson, Ashley Pacicco and Erin Reed: Histological
    Maturity Designations and L50 Values.

3.  Kevin Kolmos and David Wyanski: Approaches to Maturity Analyses by
    the SouthEast Reef Fish Survey

4.  Lyndsey Lefebvre: Maturity assessment in Sebastes

5.  Richard McBride: Measuring the gonad wall as an index of maturity:
    Through thick and thin

6.  Rosario Dom√≠nguez Petit: Maturity Assessment in the ICES

[Link to video
recording](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c-8odvb35c9q5k-MYXl-KnOpF0GMg3O9/view?usp=share_link).

## Summer 2022

[Parasite
Seminar](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Kjj59hXDyvghe2M0NrIvB_rCoK7jcAp7?usp=sharing).
Parasitologist Dr. Isaure de Buron reviewed fish parasites from
histology images of fish parasites submitted
[here](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Kjj59hXDyvghe2M0NrIvB_rCoK7jcAp7?usp=sharing).
[Link to video
recording.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bjjDk1itYthr1AOtmgn9gmibUNwK2QQQ/view?usp=sharing)
There are also some good references in the google folder.
